itemDescription: Welsh rugby union and rugby league footballer

wikipedia_page.main: Palmer Griffiths (first ¼ 1880 – first ¼ 1973) was a Welsh rugby union, and professional rugby league footballer who played in the 1900s. He played club level rugby union (RU) for Penygraig RFC, as a forward, and club level rugby league (RL) for Merthyr Tydfil and Swinton, as a fullback, i.e. number 1.
